Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 03/01/2024 05:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.
